javadoc: Array of byte[] that grows as needed.

methods.name: put
methods.comment:
Puts the given short array value in the short array array at
 the given index

methods.name: get
methods.comment: Returns the short array at the given index

return.comment:
The short array value at the given index. An empty array will
 be return for any index not initialized to
 another value.

methods.name: remove
methods.comment: Removes the short array at the given index

params.name: index
params.comment: index of the array to be removed

methods.javadoc:
Grows the array.  The new array capacity will be
 the maximum of minCapacity and twice the current
 capacity.
@param minCapacity The minimum size to grow the array.
methods.name: adjustArraySizes
methods.comment:
Grows the array.  The new array capacity will be
 the maximum of minCapacity and twice the current
 capacity.

methods.name: shrinkArrays
methods.comment:
Shrinks the starts and lengths array as items at the end of the list
 are removed.

params.name: capacity
params.comment: the new size to make the arrays

methods.name: allocSpace
methods.comment: Allocates space for storing the array

params.name: size
params.comment: number of elements to allocate space for

return.comment:
Returns the start position in the buffer for the
 storage for the array

methods.name: adjustSpace
methods.comment:
Adjusts the buffer size as the storage requirements change.
 Every time the buffer is resized, arrays are compacted.

params.name: newSize
params.comment: the new size to adjust the buffer to

methods.javadoc: Returns the index of the last non-null or non-zero element in the array.
methods.name: getLastNonEmptyIndex
methods.comment: Returns the index of the last non-null or non-zero element in the array.

name: ShortArrayArray
comment: Array of byte[] that grows as needed.
